recipes.title: Nuclear missile silo
recipes.description: The nuclear missile silo was a Soviet superweapon deployed during Third World War and its second iteration.
ingredientLines: 4 baby chickens (poussins) or cornish hens (about 1 1/4 pounds each), or 4 chicken breast halves
1 tablespoon crushed red-pepper flakes, or to taste

recipes.title: Weather Control Device
recipes.description: The weather control device (or weather machine), was an Allied superweapon used during the Third World War and its second iteration, designed by Albert Einstein as a weapon of last resort.
ingredientLines: 2 or 3 links of chineses sausage, cut into 1/4 inch slices
Finely chopped green onion or cilantro

recipes.title: Airforce Command Headquarters
recipes.description: The Airforce Command Headquarters was an Allied facility during the Third World War and the Psychic Dominator Disaster that provided three main roles.
ingredientLines: 40 chicken wing pieces, or 20 whole chicken wings
Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper
1/3 to 1/2 cup chopped fresh cilantro leaves
1/4 cup light or regular sour cream
Juice 1/2 lemon (or why not try lime?)

recipes.title: Soviet battle lab
recipes.description: The Battle Lab was the successor of the Tech Center, allowing commanders to pursue the research and development of advanced units and structures.
ingredientLines: 1.0 tbsp vinegar (you can use cider, malt or wine)

recipes.title: Spy satellite
recipes.description: The Spy Satellite Uplink was an Allied structure used during the Third World War and the Psychic Dominator Disaster that revealed the entire battlefield.
ingredientLines: 6 to 8 fresh long rice cake sticks, or 20 smaller rice cake sticks
3 to 4 tablespoons light soy sauce, depending on saltiness

recipes.title: Psychic dominator
recipes.description: The psychic dominator was Yuri's superweapon from the Third World War, developed as a trump card with which he intended to conquer the world.
ingredientLines: 1 box (about 18 oz.) yellow or white cake mix

recipes.title: Cloning vat
recipes.description: Cloning vats were a Soviet infantry production structure used during the first iteration of the Third World War.
ingredientLines: 2 1/2 cups self-rising white lily or cake flour

recipes.title: Nuclear reactor
recipes.description: The nuclear reactor was the solution to Soviet power consumption needs.
ingredientLines: 1 tbsp butter for creamed chanterelle mushroom sauce
Salt and freshly ground black pepp

recipes.title: Chronosphere
recipes.description: The Chronosphere was a mass teleportation device developed by the Allies during the Second World War.
ingredientLines: 1 cup cream or half and half

recipes.title: Soviet construction yard
recipes.description: The Soviet construction yard was a facility from which Soviet buildings and base defenses were built during the first and second iterations of the Third World War.
